Text:
function RIR_EP04_08()
    -- .起-6【11月第2週】「惚れたのか、私以外の女に」
    SaveData.Title = "惚れたのか、私以外の女に"

    -- //BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav")

    -- //BU：アキラ（焦り・部屋着）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0927.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "A d-date with Lira Hoozuki's little sister!?!" ]])

    MSG([[ After coming back from the boys' club room, I told Akira about what happened today, and she let out a voice so loud it surprised me. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0952.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "It's surprising, isn't it? A girl asking me out on a date." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0928.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "N-no, I’m not surprised by that. But Minachin, the king of extreme siscon, showing interest in a girl other than Mariccho—that’s something else." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)


PLAY_VOICE("akira_0929.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Tomorrow it might snow... no, maybe even meteors will fall." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0953.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "That’s such a harsh thing to say." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Still, it’s true that I haven’t had any frivolous talk with girls until now, enough that it’s no wonder she says that. ]])

    MSG([[ I’ve always focused on catching up with my sister Marika, and haven’t really been on a proper date. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0954.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Hey, Akira. Could you think up some outfit coordinates for my date instead of me?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0930.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "W-why me? You’ve learned plenty about fashion so far, so you should choose for yourself." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0955.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I’ve studied a lot about girls’ fashion, but I’m clueless about men’s fashion." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03fb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0931.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Oh... what an irony. What a strange fate. Well, honestly, Minachin’s natural fashion sense is pretty suspicious." ]])

    MSG([[ Once when I tried to go out wearing a white tank top and shorts, I was scolded with “That doesn’t suit you at all!” ]])

    MSG([[ The clothes I usually wear are actually chosen by Akira, and embarrassingly, I have no confidence at all in my own fashion sense. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s definitely better to honestly listen to what Akira says. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0932.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Do you like that Riko that much?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0956.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Uh..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Akira’s direct question made me think. The answer came out surprisingly smoothly, even to myself. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0957.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I don’t know yet. But I want to like her." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0958.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Until now, I only admired my sister Marika, and no one ever showed me affection." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0959.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "It feels strange somehow. My heart beats fast... but it feels kind of comfortable. I want to face Riko properly... that’s how I feel." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0960.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "S-sorry, for saying something weird. Even though I haven’t saved Marika... it’s improper, isn’t it?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0933.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "No, it’s not improper at all." ]])

    MSG([[ Akira dismissed my weak remark and continued speaking. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0934.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Like I said before when helping Ouga, Minachin kills himself too much for Mariccho’s sake. Whatever causes it, it’s almost pathological." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0935.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It’s not like you’re drowning in pleasure. You should enjoy a date with a girl you’re interested in." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0936.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Actually, I’m relieved. You can direct romantic feelings at someone other than your sister." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0961.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "N-no, my feelings for sister Marika aren’t like that!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0962.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "J-just... I never even thought about being liked by a girl before." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0937.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "...You’ve actually received affection for years." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0963.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Huh? What did you say?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0938.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Don’t worry about it. It’s the result of being too twisted, and your own fault. As long as Minachin is happy, that’s enough." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0939.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Anyway, now it’s about fashion, right? Well, don’t you think your usual clothes are fine? Surely the other person wants the usual Minachin." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0964.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I-is that so? If I’m too usual, I’m afraid Riko might be disappointed." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0940.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Actually, putting too much effort into a first date often leads to failure. You should attack naturally... that’s what a confident love guru on the internet said." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0941.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Trust me. And if you get rejected anyway, I’ll save you with my special overly sensitive love." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0965.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Thanks, Akira. If I fail, I’ll probably be down, so I’m counting on you." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ And so―― ]])

    MSG([[ The consultation with Akira about the weekend date continued late into the night. ]])

    -- 　　　◆
STOP_BGM(2000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0942.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Alright, Minachin finally fell asleep. Time to boot up the PC." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0943.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Oh, Rikopin’s online and lively as usual. Okay, I’ll press the call button now<sprite="Emoji" name="star">" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0725.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rikopin】
 "...Hmm? What’s up, Akira, at this late hour? I have school tomorrow, so I’m about to sleep soon." ]])


LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03eb")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0944.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "R-" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_BGM("BGM07.wav")

    -- //CI：泣き崩れるアキラ・継続 119
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI119a")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03da")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0945.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Rikopiiiiiin... my first love is crushed... waaaahhhhhhhhhhhhh..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0726.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rikopin】
 "Hey!? Your character’s breaking down! Calm down!!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0727.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rikopin】
 "I’m on your side. Okay? Slowly tell me what happened." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03da")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0946.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Uuuh... Thank you, Rikopin. You’re the only one I can cling to now..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0728.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rikopin】
 "Alright, alright. So then? Tell me what happened." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03da")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0947.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "The story goes back five years, to the day I seriously started shutting myself in at home." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0729.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rikopin】
 "Ah, this is gonna be an all-nighter, isn’t it? Sorry, I’ll go make some lemon tea." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RIR_EP04_09")
end
